dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.policy.fmk.Policy
dataStructure.description:
This is an abstract base class, and is the root of the Policy DEN-ng model. As such, it defines common attributes, methods and relationships that all policy subclasses use and take part in.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: Policy

child.name: policyName
child.description:
This is a generic naming attribute that can be used to identify different policy entities. This enables commonName to be used to enforce enterprise or service provider generic naming and this attribute to be used to fine tune the naming of policy entities. Thus, commonName is public in scope and policyName is private to policy.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: policyName

child.name: keywords
child.description:
This is a string attribute that defines a set of one or more keywords that a policy administrator may use to assist in characterizing or categorizing a policy object to facilitate search operations. The following keywords are pre-defined: Unknown InstallPermissions ConfigChange InstallMethod Default Error Usage InternalError Security ExternalError Authentication Notification Authorization Publish Accounting Subscribe Auditing Publish-Subscribe Service Exception CustomerFacingService ResourceFacingService

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: keywords

child.name: policyApplication
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association PolicyAppUsesPolicy

This association end is optional
child.label: policyApplication

child.name: policyDomain
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity 0..*

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association PolicyAppliesToDetails

This association end is optional
child.label: policyDomain

child.name: policyRepository
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association PolicyStoredIn

This association end is optional
child.label: policyRepository
